To **zap** a [wand](/wiki/Wand "Wand"), press [z](/wiki/Z "Z"). Some wands, like the [wand of light](/wiki/Wand_of_light "Wand of light") or the [wand of wishing](/wiki/Wand_of_wishing "Wand of wishing"), act immediately. Some, like the [wand of striking](/wiki/Wand_of_striking "Wand of striking"), ask for a [direction](/wiki/Direction "Direction") to fire.

If you press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [z](/wiki/Z "Z"), then you [cast a spell](/wiki/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") instead.

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

Zap

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Keyboard commands
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ = +
Q W E R T Y U I O P { } |
q w e r t y u i o p [ ] \
A S D F G H J K L : "
a s d f g h j k l ; '
Z X C V B N M < > ?
z x c v b n m , . /
q w e r t u i o p Alt
a s d f j l Alt
c v n m ? Alt
A C R T O Alt
a c d o p r t [ Ctrl

To zap a wand, press z. Some wands, like the wand of light or the wand of wishing, act immediately. Some, like the wand of striking, ask for a direction to fire.

If you press shift + z, then you cast a spell instead.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
